content.rendered:
SOCCER MADE EASY

Websites, Registration, Youth Soccer Management Tools, & More with U.S. Soccer Connect!

Get Started

Learn More

Trusted By

FEATURES

DATA MANAGEMENT

Securely collect and manage member information with 24/7 access to the data you need to run your organization.

SAFETY & COMPLIANCE

Prioritize player safety using integrations with several leading background check providers and safety education platforms including Safesport.

U.S. SOCCER LEARNING CENTER

Track and manage volunteer certificate and training status, including concussion awareness training completion.

PROFESSIONAL WEBSITES

Give your league an edge with a mobile-friendly, easy-to-manage website that is fully integrated with your club management tools.

REGISTER ANY PROGRAM

Handle any registration workflow from camps to tryouts with our flexible registration tool built for mobile.

ONLINE PAYMENTS

Collect money, create payment plans, automate reminders, and track order progress all in one place.

Get Started

BUILT FOR ANY DEVICE

Other Services

GameChanger

Bring your schedule updates, roster management, customized team chats, and more all into the palm of your hand.

CaptainU

Help connect athletes with collegiate teams through online profiles, easy communication tools, and more.

Officials Connect

Simplify official management with online scheduling, assessment, and payments.

Stack Raise

Create a campaign for your school or team in minutes and securely raise money online.

START NOW TO SAVE TIME AND MONEY




